survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Travel Accommodations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and priorities when selecting sustainable travel accommodations, including eco-friendly hotels, lodges, and other lodging options.

questions.question_text: When choosing travel accommodations, how important is sustainability to you?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure importance levels clearly.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices in travel accommodations do you value most? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Locally sourced and organic food options
Certification by recognized eco-labels (e.g., LEED, Green Key)
Support for local communities and economies
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 response is 'Extremely important', 'Very important', or 'Moderately important'.
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed to identify top priorities.
